Posts.Content: Hi I just started FEC on Friday and already feeling a bit sickish but not as bad as lack of sleep. I have been reading about side effects of dexamethasone and am thinking about stopping taking this. Has anyone tried this?
Posts.Title: Sickness Durung Chemo FEC

Posts.Content: Can you request the onco dx test? The results from this could help you decide.
Posts.Title: to choose chemo or not ??

Posts.Content: The best advice I got was to get a really nice pair of non prescription glasses, coupled with a lovely short wig I had a whole new look and this also protects your eyes from wind, grit etc when you have no eyelashes. This made me feel normal and I never worried about make up. Mops
Posts.Title: Eyebrows and eyelashes - What do you do when they are gone??
